snippet: Shi Tao, also a journalist and poet, was sentenced in 2005 for leaking “state secrets” via a Yahoo e-mail account.
abstract: Chinese journalist and democracy advocate Shi Tao, who was arrested in 2004 for leaking state secrets, is released from prison, having served only 8 years of his 10-year sentence.
lead_paragraph: Shi Tao, also a journalist and poet, was sentenced in 2005 for leaking “state secrets” via a Yahoo e-mail account.

headline.main: Chinese Democracy Advocate Is Freed After 8 Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: Chinese Democracy Advocate Is Freed After 8 Years in Prison
